mapper.select: SELECT a.uuid fittingUuid, b.uuid goodsUuid, b.goods_name goodsName, b.standard_price standardPrice, b.goods_image goodsImage, b.part_info partInfo, b.materiel_info materielInfo, b.accessories_info accessoriesInfo, b.cover FROM goods_fitting a, goods b WHERE a.members_uuid = #{membersUuid} AND a.figure_uuid = #{figureUuid} AND a.del_flag = FALSE AND a.goods_uuid = b.uuid AND b.del_flag = FALSE AND b.`status` = 1 ORDER BY a.modify_date DESC LIMIT #{pageNo},#{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(1) fittingCount FROM goods_fitting WHERE goods_uuid = #{goodsUuid} AND DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m') AND del_flag = 0
